Verses: 1 allelooyaa, Semmaiyaanavargaludaiya Sangaththilum Sabaiyilum Karththarai Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Thudhippen
2 karththarin Seygaigal Periyavaigalum, Avaigalil Piriyappadugira Ellaaraalum Aaraayappadugiravaigalumaayirukkiradhu.
3 avarudaiya Seyal Magimaiyum Magaththuvamumulladhu, Avarudaiya Needhi Endrendraikkum Nirkum.
4 avar Thammudaiya Adhisayamaana Seygaigalai Ninaivukoorumpadi Seydhaar, Karththar Irakkamum Manaurukkamum Ullavar.
5 thamakku Bayandhavargalukku Aagaaram Koduththaar; Thamadhu Udanpadikkaiyai Endrendraikkum Ninaippaar.
6 jaadhigalin Sudhandharaththai Thamadhu Janangalukku Koduththadhinaal, Thamadhu Kiriyaigalin Belaththai Avargalukku Theriyappaduththinaar.
7 avarudaiya Karaththin Kiriyaigal Saththiyamum Niyaayamumaanavaigal; Avarudaiya Kattalaigalellaam Unmaiyaanavaigal.
8 avaigal Endrendraikkumulla Sadhaakaalangalukkum Urudhiyaanavaigal, Avaigal Unmaiyum Semmaiyumaai Seyyappattavaigal.
9 avar Thamadhu Janaththirku Meetpai Anuppi, Thamadhu Udanpadikkaiyai Niththiya Udanpadikkaiyaaga Kattalaiyittaar; Avarudaiya Naamam Parisuththamum Bayangaramumaanadhu.
10 karththarukku Bayappadudhale Gnaanaththin Aarambam; Avarudaiya Karpanaigalinpadi Seygira Yaavarukkum Narpuththiyundu; Avar Pugazhchchi Endraikkum Nirkum.
